schoolDistrict: Dobbs Ferry Union Free School District
description: Elegant end-unit townhouse in the sought-after Riverside Court community. Features an open floor plan, soaring ceilings, and a private deck overlooking a wooded backdrop. Minutes to Dobbs Ferry Metro-North and the waterfront village.

seo.title: 88 Riverside Court, Dobbs Ferry NY | $649,000
seo.description: 3BR/2BA end-unit townhouse in Dobbs Ferry. Open floor plan, private deck, Metro-North nearby. Listed by Pinnacle Realty Group.
